mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HAIRSHOP (shop_register, shop_id, shop_pw, shop_name, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_start, shop_end, shop_regular, shop_tag, shop_intro, shop_image) VALUES (#{shop_register}, #{shop_id}, #{shop_pw}, #{shop_name}, #{shop_address}, #{shop_phone}, #{shop_start}, #{shop_end}, #{shop_regular}, #{shop_tag}, #{shop_intro}, #{shop_image})
